pages.text: When the total amount of sponsorship reaches 36 CNY, the player becomes a sponsor of the modpack. $(br2)Sponsors can customize a special item exclusively for them within reasonable limits. $(br2)Upon entering the game, a green welcome message will be displayed.
When sending a message in the chat, the parentheses next to the name will have a special color, just like this: $(br2)$(2)<$()Name$(2)>$() Message
